title: Drawing, "Basket Weave Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined
description: Basket weave pattern consisting of forty-two squares, alternating vertical and horizontal lines painted in ochre on a cream background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Basket Weave Pattern, Textile Design", 1950–70.
1950–70. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-43.
